titles.title: Praise Is The Power Of Heaven

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise is the power of heaven.
Praise is the power of heaven.
Praise is the power that opens the door
To the King, the King of kings.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The powers of darkness shall flee,
As we praise and we magnify Thee.
Praise is the power that opens the door
To the King, the King of kings.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: La alabanza es el poder del cielo (2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
La alabanza es el poder, que abre las puertas
Al Rey al Rey de reyes

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
El poder de las tinieblas huira
Al adorarle y magnificarle

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
La alabanza es el poder,
Que abre las puertas
Al Rey al Rey de reyes
